00023 #include <Rotation.h>
00024 
00025 Implemente_instanciable(Rotation,"Rotation",Transformer);
00026

00028 // Precondition:
00029 // Parametre: Sortie& os
00030 // Signification: un flot de sortie
00031 // Valeurs par defaut:
00032 // Contraintes:
00033 // Acces: entree/sortie
00034 // Exception:
00035 // Effets de bord:
00036 // Postcondition: la methode ne modifie pas l'objet
00037 //
00038 //! Simple appel a: Transformer::printOn(Sortie\&)
00039 /** \return Sortie\&<br>
00040 Signification: le flot de sortie modifie<br>
00041 Contraintes: */
00042 Sortie& Rotation::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00043 {
00044   return Transformer::printOn(os);
00045 }

00047 // Precondition:
00048 // Parametre: Entree& is
00049 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00050 // Valeurs par defaut:
00051 // Contraintes:
00052 // Acces: entree/sortie
00053 // Exception:
00054 // Effets de bord:
00055 // Postcondition:
00056 //
00057 //! Simple appel a: Transformer::ReadOn(Sortie\&)
00058 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00059 Signification: le flot d'entree modifie<br>
00060 Contraintes: */
00061 Entree& Rotation::readOn(Entree& is)
00062 {
00063   return Transformer::readOn(is);
00064 }
00065 
00066 Entree& Rotation::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00067 {
00068   associer_domaine(is);
00069   verifie_type_elem();
00070 
00071   Noms les_fcts;
00072   les_fcts.dimensionner(dimension);
00073 
00074   int dir_axe,dir1,dir2;
00075   double coor1,coor2,angle;
00076   Nom axe_direction,nomc1,nomc2,nomang;
00077   Nom var1,var2,var_axe;
00078   double pi = M_PI;
00079   is>>axe_direction;
00080 //
00081   dir_axe=-1;
00082   if (Motcle(axe_direction)=="X")
00083     dir_axe=0;
00084   else if (Motcle(axe_direction)=="Y")
00085     dir_axe=1;
00086   else if (Motcle(axe_direction)=="Z")
00087     dir_axe=2;
00088   else
00089     {
00090       Cerr<<"The direction of the rotation axis must be specified by X, Y or Z"<<finl;
00091       exit();
00092     }
00093 
00094   is>>coor1>>coor2>>angle;
00095   angle = (2*pi)*(angle/360.);
00096   nomc1 = Nom(coor1);
00097   nomc2 = Nom(coor2);
00098   nomang = Nom(angle);
00099 
00100   dir1=-1;
00101   dir2=-1;
00102   if (dimension==3)
00103     {
00104       if (dir_axe==0)
00105         {
00106           var1="(y-";
00107           var2="(z-";
00108           var_axe="x";
00109           dir1=1;
00110           dir2=2;
00111         }
00112       else if (dir_axe==1)
00113         {
00114           var1="(z-";
00115           var2="(x-";
00116           var_axe="y";
00117           dir1=2;
00118           dir2=0;
00119         }
00120       else if (dir_axe==2)
00121         {
00122           var1="(x-";
00123           var2="(y-";
00124           var_axe="z";
00125           dir1=0;
00126           dir2=1;
00127         }
00128 
00129       les_fcts[dir_axe] = var_axe;
00130     }
00131   else
00132     {
00133       var1="(x-";
00134       var2="(y-";
00135       dir1=0;
00136       dir2=1;
00137     }
00138 
00139   les_fcts[dir1] = var1;
00140   les_fcts[dir1] += "(";
00141   les_fcts[dir1] += nomc1;
00142   les_fcts[dir1] += ")";
00143   les_fcts[dir1] += ")*cos(";
00144   les_fcts[dir1] += nomang;
00145   les_fcts[dir1] += ")-";
00146   les_fcts[dir1] += var2;
00147   les_fcts[dir1] += "(";
00148   les_fcts[dir1] += nomc2;
00149   les_fcts[dir1] += ")";
00150   les_fcts[dir1] += ")*sin(";
00151   les_fcts[dir1] += nomang;
00152   les_fcts[dir1] += ")";
00153   les_fcts[dir1] += "+(";
00154   les_fcts[dir1] += nomc1;
00155   les_fcts[dir1] += ")";
00156 
00157   les_fcts[dir2] = var1;
00158   les_fcts[dir2] += "(";
00159   les_fcts[dir2] += nomc1;
00160   les_fcts[dir2] += ")";
00161   les_fcts[dir2] += ")*sin(";
00162   les_fcts[dir2] += nomang;
00163   les_fcts[dir2] += ")+";
00164   les_fcts[dir2] += var2;
00165   les_fcts[dir2] += "(";
00166   les_fcts[dir2] += nomc2;
00167   les_fcts[dir2] += ")";
00168   les_fcts[dir2] += ")*cos(";
00169   les_fcts[dir2] += nomang;
00170   les_fcts[dir2] += ")";
00171   les_fcts[dir2] += "+(";
00172   les_fcts[dir2] += nomc2;
00173   les_fcts[dir2] += ")";
00174 
00175   transformation_complete(les_fcts);
00176   return is;
00177 }
